name: Time Trial (MrWhiteRaccoon)
description:
Race against time in this fast paced game. Try avoid the red blocks and get some extra time with the golden clocks. If something hits you, you die, if time's over, you die too

Hint: You can disable the "aiming" guide in settings, only if you are really confident about your abilities ;-)

Controls:

WASD- Movement

Software Used:

-Unity3D

-Blender

Assets Used:

-Cinemachine

-TextMesh Pro

Everything else was made by me for the JamDNA
